citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50 pm on
08December2023. The inspector honked the horn multiple times but no one was on the premises. Note that the inspector
does not get out of car at this location due to the many dogs on the premises. The inspector called the registrant but no
one answered. A message was left requesting a call back. No call back was received while the inspector waited the
required 30 minutes. Inspector left the premises at 3:20 PM.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:50 pm on 
08December2023. The inspector honked the horn multiple times but no one was on the premises. Note that the inspector 
does not get out of car at this location due to the many dogs on the premises. The inspector called the registrant but no 
one answered. A message was left requesting a call back. No call back was received while the inspector waited the 
required 30 minutes. Inspector left the premises at 3:20 PM. 
 
 
End Section
